# The `InstructionCost.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file includes the function definitions for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> class that is used when calculating the cost of an instruction, or a group of instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file includes the function definitions for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> class that is used when calculating the cost of an instruction, or a group of instructions.
